name: Curve UST Pool
description: This token represents a Curve liquidity pool. Holders earn fees from users trading in the pool, and can also deposit the LP to Curve's gauges to earn CRV emissions. This metapool contains 3Crv (DAI, USDC, and USDT) and UST. While still active, this pool also has a newer UST v2 Wormhole pool.

en.description: This token represents a Curve liquidity pool. Holders earn fees from users trading in the pool, and can also deposit the LP to Curve's gauges to earn CRV emissions. This metapool contains 3Crv (DAI, USDC, and USDT) and UST. While still active, this pool also has a newer UST v2 Wormhole pool.

fr.description: This token represents a Curve liquidity pool. Holders earn fees from users trading in the pool, and can also deposit the LP to Curve's gauges to earn CRV emissions. This metapool contains 3Crv (DAI, USDC, and USDT) and UST. While still active, this pool also has a newer UST v2 Wormhole pool.

es.description: Este token representa un grupo de liquidez de Curve. Los titulares obtienen tarifas de los usuarios que comercian en el grupo y también pueden depositar el LP en los gauges de Curve para obtener emisiones de CRV. Este metapool contiene 3Crv (DAI, USDC y USDT) y UST. Si bien aún está activo, este grupo también tiene un grupo UST v2 Wormhole más nuevo.

de.description: This token represents a Curve liquidity pool. Holders earn fees from users trading in the pool, and can also deposit the LP to Curve's gauges to earn CRV emissions. This metapool contains 3Crv (DAI, USDC, and USDT) and UST. While still active, this pool also has a newer UST v2 Wormhole pool.

tr.description: Bu jeton, bir Curve likidite havuzunu temsil eder. Sahipler, havuzda işlem yapan kullanıcılardan ücret alır ve ayrıca CRV emisyonları kazanmak için LP'yi Curve'un göstergelerine yatırabilir. Bu meta havuzu 3Crv (DAI, USDC ve USDT) ve UST içerir. Hâlâ etkinken, bu havuz ayrıca daha yeni bir UST v2 Wormhole havuzuna sahiptir.

vi.description: This token represents a Curve liquidity pool. Holders earn fees from users trading in the pool, and can also deposit the LP to Curve's gauges to earn CRV emissions. This metapool contains 3Crv (DAI, USDC, and USDT) and UST. While still active, this pool also has a newer UST v2 Wormhole pool.

zh.description: 此代幣是 Curve 的流动性池代币。代币持有者可以赚取交易费，也可以将代币存入 Curve gauge 以获得 CRV 奖励。其中包含 3Crv (DAI, USDC, USDT) 和 UST，这个流动性池还有个最新的版本 UST v2 Wormhole pool。

hi.description: यह टोकन Curve लिक्विडिटी पूल का प्रतिनिधित्व करता है। धारक पूल में व्यापार करने वाले उपयोगकर्ताओं से शुल्क कमाते हैं, और CRV उत्सर्जन अर्जित करने के लिए LP को Curve के गेज में भी जमा कर सकते हैं। इस मेटापूल में 3Crv (DAI, USDC, और USDT) और UST शामिल हैं। जबकि अभी भी सक्रिय है, इस पूल में एक नया UST v2 Wormhole पूल भी है।
